title: Nintendo and Game Boy logos
content:
Does anyone know the font that was used for the old Game Boy logo's (there are two different weights)? And while we're at it: for the Nintendo logo?  
My guess is custom, right?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gameboy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011013104/http:/typophile.com/files/gameboy_0.jpg) | 92.14 KB |
| [nintendo-gameboy-logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011013104/http:/typophile.com/files/nintendo-gameboy-logo.jpg) | 16.76 KB |
| [nintendo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011013104/http:/typophile.com/files/nintendo.jpg) | 44.99 KB |
author: ill sans

comments.content:
Game Boy looks like a condensed Futura Demi Oblique with a customised G, Nintendo is more than likely custom.

Tim

That was exactly what I thought.  
Thanks anyway!

I think the Game Boy logo also looks a lot like [Gill Sans Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011013104/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/gill_sans_1/&sample_text=GAME%20BOY&sample_size=36).
